404.description: Dies ist wahrscheinlich nicht die Seite, nach der Sie suchen.

header.title: Design Patterns
header.subtitle: Bereichern Sie Ihre Projekte mit unseren sorgfältig entwickelten Design-Patterns, die speziell für die Anforderungen der Webentwicklung konzipiert sind. Die inovex Elements Webkomponenten ermöglicht Ihnen, zusammen mit Tailwind CSS, ästhetisch ansprechende Benutzeroberflächen mühelos zu erstellen. Unsere Hingabe zur Qualität garantiert, dass jedes Pattern präzise für moderne Webapplikationen gestaltet wird.

login.title: Login
login.description: Empfangen Sie Nutzer mit einem Login-Design, das sowohl benutzerfreundlich als auch optisch überzeugend ist.

settingsPage.title: Einstellungsseite
settingsPage.description: Bieten Sie eine übersichtliche und anpassbare Einstellungsoberfläche, die es Benutzern ermöglicht, ihre Präferenzen einfach zu verwalten.

highlightedCodes.login:
<div
  class="h-[682px] w-[565px] bg-white rounded-2xl border border-solid border-inovex-p-5 shadow-2xl grid grid-rows-auto gap-y-8 px-24 py-28"
>
  <h1 class="text-left">Login to your account</h1>
  <p class="text-left body-l text-inovex-n-11 pb-8">
    Welcome back! Enter your credentials to access your account. This modern
    login interface is crafted with inovex Elements and Tailwind CSS.
  </p>

  <ino-input label="Email" outline type="email"></ino-input>
  <ino-input label="Password" outline type="password"></ino-input>

  <div class="flex justify-between items-center">
    <ino-checkbox>
      <span class="body-l text-inovex-n-11">Remember me</span>
    </ino-checkbox>
    <a class="body-l">Forgot your password?</a>
  </div>

  <div class="flex justify-end">
    <ino-button variant="filled">Login</ino-button>
  </div>
</div>
highlightedCodes.settingsPage:
<ino-nav-drawer class="relative" anchor="left" variant="docked" open>
  <div slot="header" class="w-full min-w-[80px]">
    <ino-img id="logo" width="22" height="31"></ino-img>
    <p class="title-s">inovex Elements</p>
  </div>

  <ino-list slot="content" role="menubar" aria-label="Main Navigation">
    <ino-nav-item role="menuitem" text="Home">
      <ino-icon icon="home"></ino-icon>
    </ino-nav-item>
    <ino-nav-item role="menuitem" text="Teams">
      <ino-icon icon="message"></ino-icon>
    </ino-nav-item>
    <ino-nav-item role="menuitem" text="Settings" activated>
      <ino-icon icon="settings"></ino-icon>
    </ino-nav-item>
  </ino-list>

  <ino-list role="menubar" slot="footer" aria-label="Footer Navigation">
    <ino-nav-item role="menuitem" text="IT Support">
      <ino-icon icon="developer"></ino-icon>
    </ino-nav-item>
  </ino-list>

  <main slot="app" class="bg-white px-20 py-10 h-screen xl:min-w-[1125px]">
    <ino-tab-bar>
      <ino-tab
        label="Account"
        a11y-controls="account-panel"
        data-target="account-panel"
      ></ino-tab>
      <ino-tab
        label="Notification"
        a11y-controls="notification-panel"
        data-target="notification-panel"
      ></ino-tab>
      <ino-tab
        label="Updates"
        a11y-controls="update-panel"
        data-target="update-panel"
      ></ino-tab>
    </ino-tab-bar>

    <div
      id="account-panel"
      class="panel grid xl:grid-cols-[2fr,1fr] grid-cols-1 xl:gap-20 gap-10 py-10"
    >
      <div>
        <h2 class="header-h2">Account</h2>
        <h3 class="title-l mt-10">Personal information</h3>
        <p class="label-l mt-3">Look up and change all your personal data.</p>

        <form class="flex flex-col gap-y-5 mt-9">
          <div class="flex xl:flex-row flex-col justify-between gap-4">
            <ino-input class="flex-grow" label="First Name" outline></ino-input>
            <ino-input class="flex-grow" label="Last Name" outline></ino-input>
          </div>
          <ino-input name="company" label="Company Name" outline></ino-input>
          <ino-input label="Industry" outline></ino-input>
          <ino-input label="Role" outline data-list="roles">
            <datalist id="roles">
              <option>Developer</option>
              <option>UX Designer</option>
              <option>Product Owner</option>
              <option>Scrum Master</option>
            </datalist>
          </ino-input>
          <ino-button id="submit-personal-info" class="self-end"
            >Save Changes</ino-button
          >
        </form>

        <div>
          <h3 class="title-l mt-8">E-Mail</h3>
          <div class="flex xl:flex-row flex-col justify-between mt-6 gap-4">
            <ino-input label="E-mail" class="flex-grow" outline></ino-input>
            <ino-button variant="text">
              <ino-icon icon="save" slot="icon-leading"></ino-icon>
              Save
            </ino-button>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div class="border-y border-inovex-p-3 py-10 mt-10 flex flex-col gap-4">
          <ino-accordion
            id="password-accordion"
            accordion-title="Change Password"
          >
            <div class="flex flex-col gap-y-5 mt-4">
              <ino-input label="Current password" outline></ino-input>
              <ino-input label="New password" outline></ino-input>
              <ino-input label="Confirm password" outline></ino-input>
              <ino-button id="change-password-button" class="self-end"
                >Save Changes</ino-button
              >
            </div>
          </ino-accordion>

          <ino-accordion
            id="security-accordion"
            accordion-title="Security Questions"
          >
            <div class="flex flex-col m-y-4">
              <div class="flex justify-between">
                <ino-select class="w-full mr-5" label="Security Question 1">
                  <ino-option value="some-id">Question 1</ino-option>
                </ino-select>
                <ino-input label="Answer 1"></ino-input>
              </div>
              <div class="flex justify-between">
                <ino-select class="w-full mr-5" label="Security Question 2">
                  <ino-option value="some-id">Question 2</ino-option>
                </ino-select>
                <ino-input label="Answer 2"></ino-input>
              </div>
              <div class="flex justify-between">
                <ino-select class="w-full mr-5" label="Security Question 3">
                  <ino-option value="some-id">Question 3</ino-option>
                </ino-select>
                <ino-input label="Answer 3"></ino-input>
              </div>
              <ino-button id="save-security-questions" class="mt-5 self-end"
                >Save Changes</ino-button
              >
            </div>
          </ino-accordion>
        </div>

        <div>
          <h3 class="title-l mt-10">Delete Account</h3>
          <div class="flex justify-between items-center mt-3">
            <p class="label-l">You wish to delete your account?</p>
            <ino-button variant="text">Yes, Delete</ino-button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="border-t border-inovex-p-3 xl:border-none">
        <div class="sticky top-0">
          <h3 class="title-l xl:m-0 mt-10">Your Photo</h3>
          <div class="w-56 flex items-center flex-col mt-8">
            <ino-avatar initials="EE" interactive></ino-avatar>
            <div class="mt-6">
              <ino-button variant="text">
                <ino-icon icon="upload" slot="icon-leading"></ino-icon>
                Upload
              </ino-button>
              <ino-button variant="text">
                <ino-icon icon="remove" slot="icon-leading"></ino-icon>
                Remove
              </ino-button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div id="notification-panel" class="panel hidden py-10 max-w-xl">
      <h2 class="header-h2">Notifications</h2>
      <p class="body-l mt-10 text-inovex-n-10">
        Choose which Notifications you want to receive.
      </p>
      <div class="flex flex-col gap-20 mt-6">
        <div>
          <h3 class="title-m mb-6">Work Updates</h3>
          <div class="flex flex-col gap-4">
            <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between mb-2">
              <span class="text-inovex-n-9">Project status updates</span>
              <ino-switch></ino-switch>
            </div>
            <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between mb-2">
              <span class="text-inovex-n-9">Task assignments</span>
              <ino-switch></ino-switch>
            </div>
            <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between mb-2">
              <span class="text-inovex-n-9">Deadline Reminders</span>
              <ino-switch></ino-switch>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div>
          <h3 class="title-m mb-6">Meeting Notifications</h3>
          <div class="flex flex-col gap-4">
            <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between mb-2">
              <span class="text-inovex-n-9">Invitation</span>
              <ino-switch></ino-switch>
            </div>
            <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between mb-2">
              <span class="text-inovex-n-9">Reminders</span>
              <ino-switch></ino-switch>
            </div>
            <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between mb-2">
              <span class="text-inovex-n-9">Cancellations</span>
              <ino-switch></ino-switch>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div>
          <h3 class="title-m mb-6">IT Notifications</h3>
          <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between mb-2">
            <span class="text-inovex-n-9">System maintenance alerts</span>
            <ino-switch></ino-switch>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div id="update-panel" class="panel hidden py-10 max-w-xl">
      <h2 class="header-h2">Updates</h2>
      <p class="body-l mt-10 text-inovex-n-10">
        Your app is currently being updated to the latest version.
      </p>
      <div class="flex flex-col gap-20 mt-6">
        <div>
          <h3 class="title-m my-6">Downloading Update...</h3>
          <ino-progress-bar
            buffer="0.9"
            progress="0.4"
            indeterminate="false"
          ></ino-progress-bar>
          <p class="body-m text-inovex-n-9 mt-2">40% downloaded...</p>
        </div>

        <div>
          <h3 class="body-m my-6">Installing Update...</h3>
          <ino-progress-bar indeterminate="true"></ino-progress-bar>
          <p class="body-m text-inovex-n-9 mt-2">
            Installation will begin shortly...
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </main>
</ino-nav-drawer>
